name: Food Battle
description: the game is all about food.your gamer is the beast that want to eating  McDonald's but there is a enemy that want to kill your player. there is a red and Blake dot that is shape as a square when you player hits the dot you can kill all the enemy's do not let the yellow circle fire pac-man touch you you will lose a life. If you see a yellow gold cone the will give you 100 each time you hit on.
